I've bought multiple white tube tops on Amazon and this one is the best quality for the price.  A few issues I've had with other tube tops -The top either falls down (have to keep pulling it back up) OR the bottom keeps rolling up my stomach -Usually they are too thin - if I try to wear nipple petals underneath you can usually see them. -Others have shrunk in the wash and then they basically became bandeau bras.  This tube top has none of those problems. The top has an elastic band to help it stay put and the bottom somehow doesn't roll up. It's also double lined so you can wear any kind of bra underneath and you can't see it. And last, it washes completely fine. It's stretchy, comfortable, cute and doesn't look cheap.  If you're looking for a basic white tube top staple — this is the one. Buy it! For reference, I ordered a size small and I'm 5'2 and 120lbs (wear size 34B in bra)

Thick soft fabric, and loved the color!

Material is nice and top is identical to photo. Loved that it is nonslip. It’s also nice and thick. Not see through. Great quality.  Disliked: Bottom of top rolls upwards.  Overall loved the top and ordered it in other colors

I bought this along with the Suksess tube top that’s also on Amazon, and this was the lesser of the two by just a bit. It seems to be good quality material and has a nice thick double lining. Style is cute! It’s a little more stretchy than the other one i tried, so if you want support you should size down for sure. If you’re between sizes DEFINITELY size down because if it’s not skin tight the double lining sort of wrinkles up.  There’s no rubber lining, so it’s not as grippy but it also doesn’t create an underarm roll on top the way a lot of tops with the tighter top band do. There are pros and cons to both, it really just depends on what you’re looking for.  I’d recommend if you’re looking for a good tube top with a really good price point!

评论概述: Stylish and Supportive: Perfect Tube Top for 4th of July
评论详情: I recently wore this red tube top for a 4th of July celebration, and I have to say, it exceeded all my expectations. As someone with a 34F bra size, finding tops that are both flattering and supportive can be a real challenge. However, this tube top checked all the boxes and more.  Firstly, the fit was impeccable. The elastic band at the top provided just the right amount of support without feeling restrictive. I was able to move comfortably throughout the day and didn't have to worry about adjusting or readjusting the top constantly, which is a common issue with strapless tops for those with larger busts. Secondly, the fabric was lightweight and breathable, perfect for a summer day outdoors.  One of the best features of this tube top was its versatility. I didn't need to wear a bra underneath, thanks to its supportive design, which is a rarity for me. It provided enough coverage and lift to feel confident without the need for additional undergarments, which is a huge win in my book.  Overall, I couldn't be more pleased with this tube top. It's stylish, comfortable, and perfectly suited for those with a larger bust size. If you're like me and struggle to find tops that fit well and look great, I highly recommend giving this one a try. It's become a staple in my wardrobe, and I'm already planning to wear it for more summer outings.

Double lined, not see through, stays up well, perfect length. I’m 5’4, 130lb, 32DD and a S fit me perfectly, it’s exactly the right length and I have no fear of it slipping down. I never write reviews but this is a keeper, will be buying in every color.
Perfect summer piece especially for larger bust.
got in 2 different colors and i am obsessed!!

I am 5’ 1” and 128 #. Ordered size small in black and it fits perfectly and is really comfortable. I like that it’s cropped but not so short. I want to order more in other colors!

评论概述: Much nicer than anticipated & definitely isn't going to slip!
评论详情: I just got this top in the mail today so I tried it on to see how it fit in case I needed to return it. It's thicker material than I expected it to be and has a good "grip" at the top so it doesn't slip down, but it's not difficult to get on at all. I didn't want to have to wear a strapless bra because they are so uncomfortable and difficult to wear for any length of time especially when I have a higher placement for my ribs and my upper waist is dramatically different in circumference. I'm always around a size 34D-36D (depending on the brand of bras and shirts) around the mid-chest, but 25-26" just below the ribs that are too high up for comfortable clothing fit. Overall I'm 5'2" and 120 lbs. This is a great fit for my body and exactly what I was looking for when I ordered it. I'll get another one in a different color now! The apricot color is more of a cream color but it will go with plenty of other clothing options so that's fine. I purchased a size small. I plan on washing it in a laundry bag such as I use for the more delicate clothes in case it doesn't hold up to the washer and dryer.

I love wearing white colored clothing but struggle with the single layer clothing due to its sheerness but this one is double layered, yay! The material is buttery soft and stretchy. I order red a small which is my usual size and it fit perfectly. I wore it with a strapless nude bra. The length hit right above my hips so I was able to tuck into my shorts.
Perfect little tube top, very soft and stretchy. For reference, I wear small and 34DD, so I like how it stretches on top and snug on the waist. Double lined, nice thickness and no show through.

It’s a nice tub, runs a tiny bit too big, but no big deal. It has an elastic band on top that prevents it from falling down, which I like. The material is nice, not see-through, double lined. A nice basic item to add to any one’s wardrobe. That would go with pretty much any bottom, like pants, or shorts or skirts.

Reviewed by my wife:  this tube top is very cute.  The material is good quality and stretches just the right amount.  There is a decent wider elastic band that goes around the top of it which keeps it up nicely.  I will be wearing it under a button down or jean jacket but it would be cute on its own also with jeans or a skirt. Overall it is decent quality and I would recommend it.

I ordered a small and have 34DD but I’m very skinny so I find smalls usually fit me best. The top is a soft very thick material. Almost like having a built in bra which is nice I can go bra less since my chest does not poke through. Most of the leftover material however is very short. The picture made it look much longer which is why o was comfortable getting a small. Some clothes on here run so big in my experience so for this item I’d say it’s safe to order 1-2x higher. The material can stretch but you’d be making the length hopefully enough coverage. I still really like the shirt , just definitely can only wear with high waisted pants and maybe a jacket

The strapless design is perfect for hot summer days and nights out, and the stretchy fabric ensures a comfortable fit. It’s easy to dress up or down, and the variety of colors makes it easy to mix and match with different outfits.
This tube top fits perfectly. The material is very soft and stretchy. This will be perfect for a hot summer day or night out.
